name: Agraphis nutans
Relationship: Compare: HYDR.; ALL-C.; CALC. PHOS.; SULPH-I.; CALC-I.
details: Catarrhal conditions; obstruction of nostrils. ADENOIDS: with enlarged tonsils. THROAT DEAFNESS. ENLARGED TONSILS. Mucous diarrhoea from cold. Chill from cold winds. Throat and ear troubles with TENDENCY TO FREE DISCHARGE FROM MUCOUS MEMBRANES. Mutinism of childhood unconnected with deafness.A relaxed condition of the system generally and a proneness to take cold on exposure to cold winds.
dosage: Third potency. Single doses of tincture. (Dr. Cooper).
